content: inspired from one piece here is a crochet devil fruit also known as gomu gomu no mi consume this fruit and you will attain stretchy powers but it comes with a cost you lose your ability to swim as the ocean tries to claim you back a most dire threat for any pirate sailing the blue sea in search of the one piece treasure the features of this devil fruit crochet pattern includes a purple sphere a green stem and swirls of textural s s hope you enjoy making it **approximate size ** 3 5 inch wide by 4 inch tall ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ i d love to see how your devil fruit amigurumi turns out tag me with your projects on instagram @ami_amour 1 also you can crochet along with me with the devil fruit tutorial 2 on my youtube channel and see the fruit in action ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **level** easy intermediate **need to know ** single_crochet in the round single_crochet decrease slip_stitch chain stitch 1 https //www instagram com/ami_amour 2 https //youtu be/7wfgkggqzd8
